_source.text: Actually, Towson has the ability in theory to be better than either Bethesda and Silver Spring, because it has better retail (Towson Town Center is comparable to Montgomery Mall but with even more upscale stores).

text: , because it has better retail (**Towson** **Town** **Center** is comparable to **Montgomery** **Mall** but with even more upscale stores).
Actually, Towson has the ability in theory to be **better** **than** either Bethesda and Silver Spring
